tests.test_visualisation package¶

Submodules¶

tests.test_visualisation.context module¶

tests.test_visualisation.decorators module¶

tests.test_visualisation.decorators.testlevel(flag)[source]¶

decorator for test functions using to define testlevels. This allows to run timeconsuming tests only if necessary.

Recommended usage: testlevel 0: very quick testlevel 1: takes a while testlevel 2: heavy computations
